description:
Sick and Tired of Getting The Infamous "App Rejected" or "Metadata Rejected ?

Look know further because this course will help you, help yourself, by teaching you the basics of How to Resolve App Store Disputes.

What you'll be learning

  • Learn Xcode Basics, How to Navigate the User Interface with Ease
  • Learn The Entire App Store Process , From Uploading to Delivery
  • App Rejected - Learn Technical Skills that will Help you Successfully Deliver your Binary.
  • Other Problems - Simulator Issues ? Code Signing Issues ? Look No Further

This course was designed for the non technical minded person in thought !!!!

What you'll be able to do after this course
  • Solve your own app store issues
  • Help others deliver their project by positioning your services to them !
  • What you can charge for helping them !
  • You'll Be More Confident when apps get disputed
If you're looking at solving your very own problems with apple then this course is for you ! I would sign up if you find any of the following a problem
  1. You Fearing App Rejection
  2. Your World Comes Crashing Down When you see "App Rejected"
  3. You're a Developer but have No Clue about app submission process
  4. You want to start offering your technical services

So don't delay and Sign Up Today ! You won't be dissapointed at this high level technical course for begginers !
title: iOS App Store Disputes and Resolving Issues : Guidance
